content:
Today I chose PR 16925 for discussion!

feat(SetTheory/Cardinal/Cofinality): aleph index of singular cardinal has infinite cofinality
Created by @None (@YnirPaz) on 2024-09-18
Labels: WIP, merge-conflict, t-set-theory

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
And defining IsSingular depends on us moving all the stuff on regular cardinals to its separate file. I'll try and get that done.
